item.title: Udemy- Learn to Code with Ruby
item.author: andrewrgoss@gmail.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description:
COURSE LINK
Many backend application engineers at my current employer use Ruby so I signed up for this course to practice and learn more about the nuances of the language. What is Ruby? An object-oriented programming language A popular language across the world Released in 1995 by Yukihiro Matsumoto (“Matz”) Open-source project in development today Available for both Windows and Mac OS operating systems Ruby Design Principles Ruby is a high-level programming language.
